text: @kylegriffin1 The Covid-19 response brought to you by the guy who brought peace to the middle east, solved the opioid crisis, conducts our foreign policy, reformed our criminal justice system, reformed the VA, got Trump to fire the FBI director which led to a special prosecutor investigation.
